abstract.t: This document describes an option for negotiating the use of MPLS and IP header compression over the Point-to-Point Protocol [STD51]. It defines extensions to the PPP Control Protocol for MPLS [LABELS]. It is based on, and borrows heavily from, IP Header Compression over PPP [RFC2509]. MPLS/IP header compression is defined in [CMPLS] and may be applied to MPLS datagrams transporting IPv4 and IPv6 datagrams in combination with TCP, UDP and RTP transport protocols
